message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to take a look?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $150 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $180, which is my minimum price, but I think you'll find it's a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $165?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $180, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from there. How about $182.50? I think that's a fair price for this great product
I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $175?

I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on this deal. How about $187.50? That's as low as I'm willing to go
I understand you're trying to make a concession, but $187.50 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from there, so how about $192.25?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $195. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. If you're still interested, this is my final offer

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to walk away if I can't get a better deal. I'll make one last offer: $190. If you can meet me at this price, I'll consider it a fair deal. If not, I'll have to look elsewhere.
